text: Meu jimeukawen agam meuzina Ngon inong zina cit jimeunikah Adak kon ngon nyan ngon inong musyrek Meunyo tabalek pih hana ubah f Meu jimeukawen inong meuzina Ngon agam zina cit jimeunikah Adak kon ngon nyan ngon agam musyrek Ã€ Hana meubalek meunankeuh ulah Atra nyan hareuem bak ureueng mukmin
